name: whoisens-lib
author: Alex Ivasyuv
description: Whois for ENS (Ethereum Name Service) lookup service

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:browser
scripts.test: time npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.test:only: npm run test-node:only && npm run test-browser:only
scripts.test-node: npm run clean && npm run test-node-esm && npm run test-node-cjs
scripts.test-node:only: npm run test-node-esm:only && npm run test-node-cjs:only
scripts.test-node-esm: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run test-node-esm:only
scripts.test-node-cjs: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run test-node-cjs:only
scripts.test-browser: npm run test-browser-esm && npm run test-browser-script
scripts.test-browser:only: npm run test-browser-esm:only && npm run test-browser-script:only
scripts.test-browser-esm: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run test-browser-esm:only
scripts.test-browser-script: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:browser && npm run test-browser-script:only
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm ci && npm run build && npm run test:only
